===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=たけとんぼ|竹|tr1=take|t1=bamboo|蜻蛉|tr2=tonbo|t2=dragonfly}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kun|たけ とんぼ|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR,NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|たけ とんぼ}}

# a [[bamboo-copter]], a [[helicopter]] [[toy]], consisting of a short [[bamboo]] or [[wooden]] [[dowel]] with a [[propeller]] affixed to one end, that [[fly|flies]] when the dowel is [[spun]] and [[release]]d

====Usage notes====
Sometimes spelled {{ja-l|竹とんぼ}}, due to the complexity and relative rarity of the kanji spelling of {{ja-l|蜻蛉}} for ''tonbo''.
